response: No. No it DOES NOT come with a headset. Whomever wrote "Yes" below is a jerk.

context: I just need a controller to work with the Nintendo 64.  Will this also work on the Nintendo?
response: This will not work as it is wired to a USB male end. N64 emulator, yes. Original N64 console, no.

context: This item as a combo is $157.99. They are separately (Mouse MX for $67.39 and K800 $64.99) $132.38. Why?
response: Have the same question.  Even Best Buy has them on the store shelves for 69.99 each.  And the combo should be significantly less since it probably only has 1 transceiver, and 1 extender cable.

context: Do you need a PSMove controller in order to operate the PSEye camera itself?
response: Technically, no, it will work on it's own, but in such a limited manner you are best off picking up a move controller.

context: How long is the USB cord?
response: From using a tape measure, I came up with 102 inches or 8 ft. 5 inches.

context: is this for just the head set or dose everthing come with it
response: Everything you need to set up and use it comes with it.

context: if i buy this product today can i use it next year? in other words my xbox member ship has about 6 months left, so can i buy this now and use it later
response: gold memberships do not expire. My iy can also redeem it now and it adds on to your membership.

response: It only works in US PSN accounts...

context: If I download this game on my current computer and eventually upgrade to a new pc, will I be able to transfer the game ?
response: Yes, you create a user name and password with ea games so on your new computer just log in and download.

context: Does it work with windows 8?
response: Yes it works fine with windows 8

context: If I was to buy the used like new day one edition will I still be able to get the day one achievement?

context: The new ps vita slim model fits well in this case????
response: I just bought a Vita slim and this case, and the Vita fits absolutely perfect in the case. I'm not sure if some of the other reviewers got cases that were designed for the older Vitas or what. All I know is this case fits great and I couldn't be happier with the case for the price.

response: Not sure...the charger has a little plastic adapter piece that fits onto the controller.  It's fits pretty tight on the controller.  If your case is very thick...I don't think it will work.

context: If we purchase Quickbooks from Amazon, does Intuit still provide support?  They tell me that you may not get their actual product.  Is this true?
response: I purchased Quickbooks from Amazon and got exactly what they said it was, Quickbooks. The support comes with the product and not the sales vendor.

context: So, to clarify, this has online gaming with friends, right?
response: Yes it does. My daughter plays with her friends all the time online. As a matter of fact, that's how she found this game. Her online friends told her about it.

context: This is listed as a PS3 peripheral.  I know they make a PC version too.  Will this wheel work with my PC?
response: yes it will  it is for pc and ps3 its a great wheel and I also purchased the other two wheels which are add ons,have fun.

context: is this the full game for this price seems to low of price?
response: It's the full price and game. It's not entirely terrible if you get for Xbox One or PS4. It's not bad on Xbox 360 or PS3, just the graphics have been severely dumbed down. The story and gameplay are what really matter.

context: Do the xbox 360 achievements still activate? Is this all three games in one place, or is it like they took each game disc and put it in one box?
response: The achievements do still activate, and it's just the discs for each individual game in one box.

context: can I set the side buttons as keyboard keys? e.g. side button 1 is " R " , so if I press that, I can reload in games
response: Yes, you can completely re-map all keys to key bindings and macros, 5 or 6 profiles too.  The other nice thing about this mouse is metal construction.  If your pads ever wear out for some un-godly reasy.  the bottom is smooth as well and will keep mapping

context: Does this game require the use of nunchucks?  Or can I use a classic controller and Wii U gamepad?  Nunchucks never work long for us...
response: You use the Wii U gamepad for player one, however if it's two person you use the classic controller with a nunchuck for player two.

context: My son damaged the original charger cord for the Wii u pad , the one that comes with the system . Will i have to replace it now that Im buying this?
response: You no longer need the one that came with the system... the energizer will charge the pad.
